_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / Great God in Trinity
Subjects: Trinity, prayers to; prayers, to Trinity
_description: ‘Salvum me fac Domine’ — six quatrains with this refrain

BodAsh189.First Lines:
FAdyr & son & holy gostGrete god in
                    trinite…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…Put A wey fro me All fereSaluum me fac
                    domine
BodAsh189.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 85.
